medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe widespread eruption of giant cellulitis-like plaques.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a 1-year history of mild purple discoloration of the left great toe, which progressed to painful, burning nodules limiting movement. Symptoms have not fluctuated with changing temperatures.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of Crohn disease, quiescent on mesalamine.
medical_history.social_history: Smoked less than 1 pack of cigarettes daily; denied alcohol or drug use.
